data.title: Patricia Arquette, Michael Sheen roped in for Kenneth Branagh's next
meta_keywords: The Last Disturbance of Madeline Hynde
data.meta_description: The production of the film is currently underway in the UK
data.text:
The latest addition to the cast list of filmmaker Kenneth Branagh's next film, The Last Disturbance of Madeline Hynde, are actors Patricia Arquette, Michael Sheen, Tom Bateman, Vicky McClure, Michael Balogun, Kristina Tonteri-Young and Karla Crome.

The ensemble cast will include actor Jodie Comer, who will play the lead, as well as Aiysha Hart and Gemma Whelan.

The independently financed film is billed as a contemporary psychological thriller, with its logline currently kept under wraps. Branagh also produces the film alongwith Tamar Thomas, Laura Berwick, Becca Kovacik, and Matthew Jenkins, with Maximum Effort's Ashley Fox and Johnny Pariseau.
